description: This is an ACT managed access requirement used to require that a user has obtained one or more GA4GH Passport Visa Claims in order to access the associated subjects.

visaConditions.description: The conditions define how this access requirement matches to each required GA4GH passport visa.  Each condition group can contain one or more VisaContions. Conditions within each group are delimited with an 'AND' while each groups are delimited with an 'OR'
